metadata.title: CVE-2019-6293 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the function mark_beginning_as_normal in nfa.c in flex 2.6.4. There is a stack exhaustion problem caused by the mark_beginning_as_normal function making recursive calls to itself in certain scenarios involving lots of '*' characters. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service.

criterions.comment: flex package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
